label: Latex Allergy
description: Allergic reaction to latex materials used in dental gloves or equipment.

label: Diabetes
description: Chronic condition affecting blood sugar levels, impacting wound healing and gum health.

label: Family History of Gum Disease
description: Increased susceptibility to periodontal diseases due to genetic predisposition.

label: Asthma
description: Respiratory condition that can be triggered by certain dental materials or stress.

label: Heart Valve Replacement
description: Requires antibiotic prophylaxis before dental procedures to prevent endocarditis.

label: Allergy to Local Anesthetics
description: Adverse reactions to commonly used anesthetics like lidocaine or novocaine.

label: Bruxism
description: Habitual grinding or clenching of teeth, leading to enamel wear and jaw issues.

label: Bleeding Disorder
description: Conditions like hemophilia that require special precautions during dental surgery.

label: Smoking History
description: Increased risk of oral cancer, gum disease, and delayed healing post-surgery.

label: Sjogren's Syndrome
description: Autoimmune condition causing dry mouth and increasing cavity risk.

label: Penicillin Allergy
description: Adverse reactions to antibiotics often prescribed for dental infections.

label: Osteoporosis
description: Bone-thinning disease affecting jawbone density, complicating implant procedures.

label: Radiation Therapy History
description: Previous head or neck radiation increases risk of osteoradionecrosis after surgery.

label: Pregnancy
description: May limit use of certain medications and require modifications in treatment plans.

label: Vitamin D Deficiency
description: Impairment in calcium absorption, affecting teeth and jawbone health.
